attributes.action: asylum seeking rioter's to be deported
attributes.additional_details:
Any person arrested and convicted of participating in the riot's throughout the united kingdom should be deported back to their country of origin if found to be seeking asylum from persecution or civil unrest from their country of origin.
While the citizen's of the united kingdom are always willing to offer aid and support we will not allow those who ask for it to engage in or profit from illegal action's.
